org.vast.ows.sld

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vast.ows.sld.Color

  • public class Color
extends Object

    Stores an RGBA color as 4 scalar parameters and provides utility methods to deal with colors.

    Author:
    Alex Robin
